title: Awards given to Lady Houns
text: Awards given to Lady Houns Comment Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 12:00 PM Updated at 12:11 PM Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 12:00 PM Updated at 12:11 PM Several members of the Aurora softball team were recognized for All-District and All-Conference honors following the end of the season. Three Lady Houns were named All-Conference in the Big 8, including: junior Morgan Montgomery, First Team; junior Paige Carr, Second Team and senior Jacy Clayton, Honorable Mention. Montgomery was also named to the First Team in All-District voting. Second Team selections for the Lady Houns were Clayton, Carr, junior Sam Sharpe and sophomore Cheyenne Eutsler. Aurora Advertiser - Aurora, MO Posted Oct. 22, 2015 at 12:00 PM Updated at 12:11 PM
